body.name: 6-Tier Adjustable Tall Bookcase, Rustic Wood and Metal Standing Bookshelf, Industrial Vintage Book Shelf Unit, Open Back Modern Office Bookcases
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 48 mins
features: 【Adjustable】 Say goodbye to the frustration of trying to fit tall vases or statues on ordinary bookshelves. Our bookshelf offers 11 different fixing positions for its 6 shelves, giving you the freedom to adjust the height of each shelf to fit any size item. Whether it's a large piece of artwork or trinkets, you'll be able to create the perfect storage and display space that works for them.

【Hold More Weight】 Unlike general bookshelves that can only hold 20-30 lbs per shelf, we've added extra metal support tubes under each shelf to increase the weight capacity to a whopping 70 lbs per shelf. Store more without the fear of shelf breaking.

【Longer Shelf】 Each shelf has been lengthened from the conventional 23.6" to 31.5" and with a total height of 71" on 6 tiers, providing you more space for all your items. Take your storage to the next level with our super-sized bookshelf.

【Stable】 Features a solid frame reinforced by X-bracing bars, balanced by adjustable feet, and secured by a wall attachment kit, ensuring that your display items and this bookshelf stay securely in place. No more worrying about wobbly shelves or tip-overs.

【Durable】 Crafted of wrought metal in a matte black finish and high-quality particle board. The board surface is covered with melamine veneer, which is non-toxic and can reduce formaldehyde emissions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE: 6 tier adjustable cosystar-Great value, excellent quality, good packaging, perfect fit!!?
reviews.reviewText: Second purchase!!Cosy Star 6 tier adjustable-great value, quality and service.Second order needed.., shelf arrived 1 day earlier than eta!! And, in this case, was delivered appropriately (heavy item delivered with carrier legit).As for product-great quality (hence second order!!) Exactly as needed and what was looking for. Piece is sturdy, substantial without being overly heavy. Does not weigh the space down. But provides sturdy and good looking storage space and nice clean aesthetic. Adjustable and all is great, could also use as a half -3 shelf unit if want. Packaging is excellent, all pieces, parts and components for assembly included and in excellent condition, instructions simple, clear. hope the value and quality lasts because these shelves are kove at first sight!!(after extensive compare/research,measuring for shelves).Highly recommend this product for price, value. Perfect fit and soo happy with this purchase and this vendor delivery fulfillment. Second item delivered legit and earlier than expected.###end product service gush###1st purchase:Soo happy I chose this item, overall excellent value. Have been looking and considering options for this need for a bit..this item, Finally decided on and SOOO HAPPY. PERFECT FIT. It is a beauty.Delivery botched, delayed AND not delivered as supposed to per weight heavy and signature/code for item security,BUT!!!this product is well packaged/secured in packaging, easy to put together, light but still sturdy and substantial feeling. Not overly heavy OR. flimsy. Adjustable shelves are great and they feel substantial and look great.VERY slight issue with one crossbar not lining up conpletely, but not a deal breaker. All parts, items in perfect condition (screws, mini chub Phillips head screwdriver included).This is a great product at a great price.perfect for what I was looking for. Highly recommend this sellar, this item and would buy again.###

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this book shelf
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased these bookcases twice, once March 2021 and again April 2021 cause I had more stuff. I have a lot of projects and books, so I needed everything to fit on these shelves for easy access and to have my hobbies in a central location.I am in the market for yet another bookcase for my closet cause, what can I say - I have more stuff lol. That led me back to this one and I noticed, that I had not written a review of this great product.Assembly was easy for me cause I like to put stuff together and they provided all the hardware needed. I love the industrial look of the bookcases and shelving is great. The shelves almost look distressed which is another plus. I did not need the bit offered to attach the shelves to the wall, because the cases are very sturdy in my opinion. Because I was mindful of what I was putting on the shelves, as you can tell after 3 years there is no sagging of the shelves and a few of those shelves is holding quite a load. I love them and would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bookcase is very solid and sturdy. Heavier than I thought it would be and well worth the money. I didn't need to secure it to my wall, but kept that hardware just in case. It is completely loaded with books and DVDs/Blu-rays and is totally stable. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5, is while the assembly is pretty simple, the instructions are vague. And the only issue I had was trying to attach the stabilizing bars across the back. They weren't long enough and I had to use a small pry bar and then start the screws at an angle to get them in. But I got it together and highly recommend this product !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, functional, adjustable and easy to assemble shelf
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! I spent several months searching for the perfect shoe rack that was deep enough, sturdy and adjustable to hold my shoes and be fashionable enough to be seen in my open laundry room. My search ended with this one. Each side bar is drilled for the shelving screws which enabled me to space the shelves out for my specific shoe needs, based on shoe heights with boots versus flats. I bought 2 complete units to have enough shelves for my shoe rack and still have enough for my office shelf. I used 8 shelves on the shoe rack and the remaining 4 shelves (12 shelves total from the two units combined) to complete the two shelving systems. Each unit comes with 6 shelves. The unit is well built and so attractive. The shelves are the perfect depth for my size 9 shoes. I have 37 pair of shoes or boots on the unit and another 4 pair on the floor under it…41 pair of organized shoes beautifully displayed!! The office unit holds the heavy binders and books nicely with no sagging from the weight of them. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together. Very sturdy. Nice appearance. Good price. I ordered a second one for another room—- really helping to get organized for the new year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've bought 4 of these. Three are in my book nook and the newest one is being utilized in husband's game room to display his collections. They are very durable and nice looking. They don't look clunky and heavy like other book shelves. I love that you can move the shelving to customize the look for your needs. The shelves hold more weight than the other book shelves I had been looking at and at a way better price. You can adjust the bases so that you can make sure they are level or in our case tilted back a little so if my kids get rambunctious around them, we don't risk any of my lighter collectable pieces that are between the books falling down. We've anchored the shelves to the wall but it's still a nice added feature. I highly recommend and will be buying another one for my book nook once I've filled the last one in there!
Works perfect for what we wanted it.. . Very sturdy
